title: What font is used for this wireless company?
content:

author: wnf

comments.content: Mixing the [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120351/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet) New York styles could do the job. If not enough bold, you could try [ITC Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) Bold customizing /t.
